data.name: Nyaaaanvy
data.detailed_description:
"Nyanvy" is a mysterious creature that looks a bit like a cat.

"Nyaaaanvy" is a game in which Nyanvies wrestle using their wiggly, physics-based bodies.

Battle the mysterious Nyanvy army in one-player Arcade and Survival modes!
Records will be ranked online. Be a faster, tougher Nyanvy!

In the online multiplayer mode, players can enjoy custom matches for up to six players, or rated matches for one-on-one competition.
You can either get together with your friends and have fun, or you can fight your way to the top of the rankings!

Customize your Nyanvy by changing its body pattern or wearing stylish glasses!
Some customizations are not cat-like. But no matter what they look like, Nyanvy are still a self-described cat.

Physics sumo-wrestling game "Nyaaaanvy"
Come on, fight everyone with your favorite Nyanvy!!
Nyanvy who wins the battle can be a true cat!! Could it be...?

***About live streaming and posting images***
You can post live streaming, videos and images with or without monetization.
For more detailed guidelines, please check the official website.

Nyaaaanvy official website
https://digitalmind8.wixsite.com/nyaaaanvy

data.short_description: Physics sumo-wrestling game! A heated battle for dignity among mysterious cat-like creatures. Nyanvy who wins the battle can be a true cat!! Could it be...?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
